title: v1.6.3.9-v6 background.js cleanup
details:
In v1.6.3.9-v6, the following cleanup was performed in background.js:

1. GAP 1 - Port infrastructure cleanup:
   - Removed no-op functions: `_sendAlivePingToPort`, `_sendAlivePingToSidebars`
   - Removed unused constants: `MAX_MESSAGE_COUNT_TRACKED`, `PORT_IDLE_CLEANUP_MS`
   - Removed call to `_sendAlivePingToSidebars()` in keepalive alarm handler
   - Port infrastructure was removed in v1.6.3.8-v12

2. GAP 2 - MessageRouter verification:
   - MessageRouter is properly integrated via `chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener(messageRouter.createListener())`
   - Dual architecture confirmed: MessageRouter (ACTION-based) + browser.runtime.onMessage (TYPE-based)
   
3. GAP 4 - State schema version:
   - Added `version: 2` field to `globalQuickTabState`

4. Lint fixes (prefixed with underscore):
   - `handleLegacyAction` → `_handleLegacyAction`
   - `handleFullStateSyncRequest` → `_handleFullStateSyncRequest`
   - `handleCloseMinimizedTabsCommand` → `_handleCloseMinimizedTabsCommand`
   - `notifyQuickTabCreated` → `_notifyQuickTabCreated`
   - `notifyStorageWarning` → `_notifyStorageWarning`
